title: How Should I Thank You?
detail_text: <:th_ch0107/>Mari-chan, Maru is done stapling all these documents zura!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Thank you, Hanamaru! I can’t possibly get all these documents ready by today~! Or so I thought. You were a huge help~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Ehehe, if you’d like, Maru can help anytime zura. Are you about done over there, Mari-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Yeah, I just need to make this document.... Alright, done! It’s all done~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>I guess I need to thank you then, Hanamaru. What would you like? You can ask for anything. Maybe something like the new pistachio ice cream that just came out the other day? Ah, a buffet at my place is also okay.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Anything?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Of course! What would it be?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Then, umm.... Maru wants you to pet me zura....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Maru was a little jealous of seeing Ruby-chan getting petted by Dia-san.... But uhh, if you don’t want to, then an ice cream would be fine....!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>My, Mari will pet you as many times as you want!! Geez, this is supposed to be a reward for you, Hanamaru, but Mari is the one getting happy~! Fufu, pet pet~~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
